reqs:
If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding waitlist section - FIPR 101, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
This is a WAITLIST section for FIPR 101, Section 001. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
courseName: Introduction to the History of Film Production
description: The history of film and film production by decade with a strong emphasis on filmmakers and advances in production technology.
